panels.visual: Visual: LIGHTSWORD RIDING STARWIND THROUGH THE SKY! Pip clings to their shoulder, wings spread in joy. Below, Darkstorm runs at incredible speed, following. The valley shrinks beneath them. Wind rushes past. It's MAGNIFICENT. Location: Sky above the valley Characters: Lightsword, Starwind (flying), Pip, Darkstorm (below)

characters.Lightsword: A glowing, indeterminate humanoid figure wrapped in soft golden-white light No defined species - ethereal and mysterious Wearing simple ceremonial robes over the glowing form
